SUIT HIRE

We cater for all age ranges and our suits range from classic fit to super slim. There is a vast selection of waistcoats, cravats and ties to choose from, making sure you match up with the bride and bridesmaids’ dresses. A £50 deposit will secure any booking. Review do not just offer wedding hire, but supply evening/tuxedos, highland wear and prom suits; many of which are kept in our showroom. Some of our collection can be viewed here.

Tel. 01642 615 861
Review, 25 Silver Street, Cultural Quarter, Stockton on Tees, TS18 1SX
